com.moppyandroid.main.service

Class MoppyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moppyandroid.main.service.MoppyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusConsumer, AutoCloseable

    public class MoppyManager
extends Object
implements StatusConsumer, AutoCloseable
    Manages all objects necessary to operate Moppy and provides methods to control them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  MoppyManager.Callback
      Callbacks fired when each method has completed successfully.

             throws MidiUnavailableException
        Constructs a new MoppyManager.

        public void receiveUpdate(StatusUpdate update)
        Triggered when the sequencer posts a StatusUpdate.
        Specified by:
        receiveUpdate in interface StatusConsumer
        Parameters:
        update - the posted StatusUpdate

      • close

        public void close()
        Releases held resources. MUST be called before this MoppyManager's destruction.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts playback if not already playing.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses playback if not already paused.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops and resets playback. A StatusType.SEQUENCE_STOPPED message is broadcasted to all registered StatusConsumers, and connected Moppy devices are sent a MoppyMessage.SYS_RESET message.

      • load

        public void load(MidiLibrary.MidiFile file,
                 Context context)
          throws IOException,
                 InvalidMidiDataException
        Loads a MidiLibrary.MidiFile into the sequencer.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load
        context - the Context to use to open the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file couldn't be opened
        InvalidMidiDataException - if the file wasn't a valid MIDI file

      • getMillisecondsLength

        public long getMillisecondsLength()
        Uses the calculations of the loaded Sequence to get the song length.
        Returns:
        the length in milliseconds

      • getMillisecondsPosition

        public long getMillisecondsPosition()
        Gets the current position within the loaded song.
        Returns:
        the position in milliseconds

      • seekTo

        public void seekTo(long millis,
                   boolean callPlay)
        Seeks to the provided millisecond position within the loaded song. If millis is greater than the length of the song, the Sequencer is advanced to the end of the song. Since reaching the end of the song automatically pauses the Sequencer, the parameter callPlay is provided to allow the caller to automatically restart playback after the seek.
        Parameters:
        millis - the position to seek to
        callPlay - true to ensure the Sequencer is playing, false to not alter the playback state

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Checks if the Sequencer is playing.
        Returns:
        true if playing, otherwise false

      • getLoadedFile

        public MidiLibrary.MidiFile getLoadedFile()
        Gets the currently loaded MidiLibrary.MidiFile.
        Returns:
        the loaded MidiFile

      • getInputReceiver

        public Receiver getInputReceiver()
        Gets the Receiver that can be used to send MIDI messages to Moppy.
        Returns:
        the Receiver to send messages to

      • getReceiver

        public Receiver getReceiver()
        Gets the ReceiverDispatcher that messages are forwarded to.
        Returns:
        the ReceiverDispatcher as a Receiver
        See Also:
        addReceiver(Receiver), removeReceiver(Receiver)

      • addReceiver

        public boolean addReceiver(Receiver receiver)
        Adds a Receiver to forward all MIDI messages to, regardless of if they originated on the MIDI wire input or the MIDI file input. See ReceiverDispatcher.add(Receiver) for more information.
        Parameters:
        receiver - the Receiver to add
        Returns:
        true if receiver was added, false if receiver was null or duplicate
        See Also:
        removeReceiver(Receiver)

      • removeReceiver

        public boolean removeReceiver(Receiver receiver)
        Removes a Receiver from the list to forward messages to.
        Parameters:
        receiver - the Receiver to remove
        Returns:
        true if receiver was removed, false if it was null or not added
        See Also:
        addReceiver(Receiver)

      • registerCallback

        public void registerCallback(MoppyManager.Callback callback)
        Registers a MoppyManager.Callback with this MoppyManager to receive calls upon method completion.
        Parameters:
        callback - the Callback instance to register

      • unregisterCallback

        public boolean unregisterCallback(MoppyManager.Callback callback)
        Removes a MoppyManager.Callback registered with this MoppManager.
        Parameters:
        callback - the Callback instance to unregister
        Returns:
        true if callback was formerly registered, otherwise false
        See Also:
        registerCallback(Callback)
